channel.title: Preparation meetups for EC Events (Editable Wiki)
channel.description:
## Here we track dates, times and availability for prep vidcalls
(This is a wiki post, that anyone can edit, by clicking the 'Edit' link in bottom-right corner of the post)
This topic is closed for discussion. Refer to Discussion thread: https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/webinar-with-the-european-commission-and-ap-community/1507
## Friday 16 April
[date=2021-04-16 time=15:00:00 timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"]
URL: https://bbb.tbm.tudelft.nl/b/joo-ijf-xcy-cil Purpose / agenda: Finalize on the content that should be in the 1st presentation
#### Available: - @aschrijver - @hamishcampbell - @j8ter - @CristinaDeLisle - @diogo - @someonewithpc - @how - @mathewlowry
#### Outcome (who does what, when):
- We finished most of the presentation. Need to include some images. Some other small things left to do. - @j8ter and @CristinaDeLisle will do a rehearsal this weekend, to check audio quality among others.
:pray: **Thanks heaps to everyone that helped create all this. YOU ROCK** :guitar:

item.title: Preparation meetups for EC Events (Editable Wiki)

Here we track dates, times and availability for prep vidcalls

(This is a wiki post, that anyone can edit, by clicking the ‘Edit’ link in bottom-right corner of the post)

This topic is closed for discussion. Refer to Discussion thread: Webinar with the European Commission and AP Community

Friday 16 April

2021-04-16T13:00:00Z

URL: FediverseWebinars
Purpose / agenda: Finalize on the content that should be in the 1st presentation

Available:

  • @aschrijver
  • @hamishcampbell
  • @j8ter
  • @CristinaDeLisle
  • @diogo
  • @someonewithpc
  • @how
  • @mathewlowry

Outcome (who does what, when):

  • We finished most of the presentation. Need to include some images. Some other small things left to do.
  • @j8ter and @CristinaDeLisle will do a rehearsal this weekend, to check audio quality among others.

Thanks heaps to everyone that helped create all this. YOU ROCK
